title: Apple didn't talk about it, but iOS 17 adds AirTag and Find My device sharing
description: That means you'll no longer get alerted of an unwanted AirTag every time you take your partners' keys.

description: Apple's next major iOS update is coming this fall to these iPhone models. Is your device on the list?

title: Meet your digital persona: Apple's Vision Pro users to get real-time animated avatars
description: With Apple's Digital Persona, you can create a custom, real-time animated avatar for video conferencing and more while wearing the Vision Pro  AR/VR headset.

title: This new AirPods Pro 2 feature will detect your conversations and adapt to them
description: Conversation Awareness will enable you to more easily talk to others with your AirPods still in. Here's how.

title: Apple just announced a ton of software features at WWDC. Here's everything new

description: The company announced its AR/VR headset at WWDC 2023, with key features and an eye-popping price tag in tow.

title: Adaptive Audio listening mode is coming to AirPods Pro 2
description: AirPods Pro 2 will get an update that blends Transparency Mode and Active Noise cancellation to help improve your listening experience. Here's what to know.

title: Apple revamps WatchOS with widgets, new fitness and health features, and more
description: WatchOS 10 will look more streamlined with new widgets and updates to activities and health apps.

title: Apple just unveiled a new AirPlay hotel integration. Here's how it works
description: The Apple ecosystem will now more easily come with you on vacation.

title: Apple will let you create stickers from your own photos and videos
description: In iOS/iPadOS 17, you'll be able to use your favorite emojis as stickers in your messages and even devise stickers from your own photos and videos.

title: You can now FaceTime from your Apple TV
description: Apple announced the new FaceTime for Apple TV feature along with Continuity Camera with tvOS updates.

description: The AirDrop-like feature was announced today at WWDC 2023. Here's how it works.

title: Apple reveals video voicemails for FaceTime users
description: Annnounced at WWDC 2023 for iOS/iPadOS 17, the new feature will let you leave a video message if the other person doesn't answer your FaceTime call.

title: iOS 17's Live Voicemail lets you read a voicemail in real time
description: At WWDC 2023, Apple unveiled a new iOS feature that lets you read or listen to a voicemail as someone is leaving it, an decide whether to answer.

description: The new pre-loaded iPhone app for journaling can help you better track your thoughts and feelings. Here's the breakdown.

description: In iOS 17, you'll be able to pick your photo and style for the image your friends see when you give them a call.

title: Generative AI can save marketing pros 5 hours per week, according to research
description: Generative AI adoption in marketing reveals promising productivity gains with marketers estimating generative AI can save them the equivalent of over a month per year, making room for more meaningful work.

title: Will companies use low code to run their businesses?
description: Low code appears to have reached a tipping point in the enterprise, with adoption starting to replace some core IT systems. But is this the future of IT or just another IT tool among many?

title: The impact of generative AI on software team productivity is... complicated
description: Generative AI means faster coding, but also more code to manage, along with greater expectations from the business.
